includedAssets.title: Ted
includedAssets.synopsis: Family Guy's Seth MacFarlane brings his distinctive voice to badly behaved bear Ted, who causes chaos for hapless owner John (Mark Wahlberg) in this pair of riotously raunchy comedies. First up, Ted comes between John and his exasperated girlfriend Lori (Mila Kunis), then he fights the law for his civil rights - with ridiculous consequences.

First up, Ted comes between John and his exasperated girlfriend Lori (Mila Kunis), then he fights the law for his civil rights - with ridiculous consequences.

includedIn.title: Ted
includedIn.synopsis: When John Bennett wished for his stuffed bear to come to life, he didn’t expect his new best friend to still be living with him and causing trouble 27 years later.
